autoChirp.preProcessing.parser

Class WikipediaParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • autoChirp.preProcessing.parser.WikipediaParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parser

    public class WikipediaParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parser
    A Parser for Wikipedia-Urls using the org.cyberneko.html.parsers.DOMParser; Creates an object of class Document, which consists of text, title, url and language. This Parser appends the content of each p-element to the documents text and selects the first h1-element as the documents title. The documents language is read directly from the Wikipedia-Url (e.g. https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/KÃ¶ln)
    Author:
    Alena Geduldig

      Document parse(java.lang.String url)
      extracts the plain text (p-elements) and title (first h1-element) of the given wikipedia-url and returns an object of class Document
